=== Review of seed changes ===

Every week, we should review desktop seed changes and merge them in UNR.

=== Review of new UNR upstream releases ===

Every week, we should review UNR releases which we didn't upload to karmic yet.

<nowiki>[[http://qa.ubuntuwire.com/uehs/no_updated.html|Out of date packages according to watch file]]</nowiki>

=== Moblin karmic integration updates ===

Every week, we should review progress of Moblin integration into karmic.
